nav.div: Johnston Public Schools » COVID-19/Educational Resources » Cox COVID-19 low cost internet

p.strong: Cox COVID-19 Coronavirus Response for Online Learning

div.p: Subject: Cox COVID-19 Online Learning Response for Low-Income Students
As you execute your digital learning plan to help prevent the spread of the Coronavirus, we want to ensure students that do not have access to the Internet at home can learn from home.

We are now offering our low-cost internet service, Connect2Compete, free for 30 days including premium remote desktop support. To get these students an internet connection as fast as possible, we want to fast-tract the qualification process. If you’d like us to help, please reach out to connectnow@cox.com with a list of *eligible students that currently do not have an internet connection at home. We can get these students qualified quickly so they can continue learning from home. Please provide contact information including first and last name including an email address and/or phone number of the eligible students.
We’ve also partnered with PCs for People where families can purchase discounted refurbished computers. More information can be found here: https://cox.pcsrefurbished.com/
Learn more in the “Learn from Home” toolkit for schools that includes a way to fast track students in need of a home internet connection and how to communicate with parents about Connect2Compete.

p.span: Sr. Account Manager, Education/K-12 – State of RI
